mapper.sql: mpr.id, mpr.member_id, m.name, m.mobile, m.sex, m.head_imgurl, m.status, m.vali_flag, mpr.point_pool_id, mpr.point, mpr.type, mpr.action, mpr.action_content, mpr.create_at, mpr.create_by
mapper.select:
select count(1) from member_point_record as mpr left join member as m on mpr.member_id = m.id where mpr.type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and mpr.point_pool_id = #{pointPoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
